name: Kimg's Burger
description:
A burger game to test the speed of your fingers!

Make the ingredients according to Customers Wish!

And be fast and precise!One wrong move and you risk losing resources and money which may lead to a deadlock situation!

[I did not have enough time to make a tutorial,but try hovering over icons to understand what to do, for example you can hover over the customer icon to see his requirement and make the ingredients accordingly]

Share me your Ratings and No of Customers in the game!

P.S-Idk how to make music,please bear with the terrible looping sound

Game starts with main Game scene, you can press the give up button to go to Menu to see hints about the game.
